Mobility was a unique and interesting feature that some champions had in trade for raw damage. I like champions like Ahri, they're mobile but it's only with her Ultimate and her Q's 30% Movement Speed. She has high damage but she's totally skillshot reliant and typically won't instakill you with her 3 main abilities unless she's fed.

People like Kalista on the other hand can just slam their face onto their keyboard and throw their mouse across the room and they get a pentakill and are halfway across the map. Very little counterplay, and she has no real fall offs.

I wish Riot would just remove some of the current mobility so that mobility is more of a unique aspect such as a champion having poison, or a shield, rather than a necessity. Most unviable champions are considered that way almost entirely due to lacking mobility/escapes/gapclosers.
This is going to get downvoted, but I don't really care. I don't think mobility in the game is too much.
